entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
